title: How to write the best argumentative assignment - Quora

response.answer_text: Know your facts. Know your audience. Who is your readership? What position do you think most of your readership holds about this situation? Once you know you audience, know your purpose. If you think the audience is neutral or opposes you, you’ll need ethos (your own credibility or those of the resources you use to back up your facts) and logos (good, logical facts). If you think the audience is on your side, you can appeal to pathos — their emotions — and present a good call to action.

Hi… Let me tell you… how to write the best argumentative assignment Select an arguable topic, preferably one which interests, puzzles, or appeals to you.Take a position on your topic, and form a thesis statement.Consider your audience.Present clear and convincing evidence.Draft your essay.Edit your draft.
